Action.author: ozheregelya
Action.body: send two NYMs -> start the 4th node. 3. Stop the 3rd node -> send two NYMs -> start the 3rd node. 4. Stop the 2nd node -> send two NYMs -> start the 2nd node. 5. Send one more NYM to prove that pool works after all nodes are online. 6. Check the domain ledger (there are no duplicated entries now). 7. Stop the 1st node (primary) -> send two NYMs -> start the 1st node. 8. Check the domain ledger (there are 2 copies in ledger now). 9. Stop the 2nd node (primary) -> send two NYMs -> start the 2nd node. 10. Check the domain ledger (there are another 2 copies in ledger now, total incorrect entries count is 4).
